description.title: Programming / CAD Development
description: Software Engineer experienced in CAD applications development. Working experience with Python, C++, C#, Java. Background in Mechanical and Materials engineering, and vast experience in 3D Modeling usi…

abstrac: Precision IT Solutions with Creativity and Passion
bio:
Being a Mechanical Engineer with a post-graduate degree in Materials Engineering, software development is a profession I chose purely out of my passion for CAD, creative development, and programming. I am intrigued by the interrelationships of diverse disciplines in the sciences, and try to find connections between them for innovative solutions.

With over 10 years in the CAD IT industry, I am well versed with software development methodologies (Agile, Project Management, Product Management), various software development tools, graphics programming for CAD applications, and general 3D mechanical CAD solutions using popular design packages. Also been involved in CAD software training and program development for technical institutes and multinational organizations, as well as business development for leading CAD software companies.

I strongly believe in providing top-quality solutions for my clients which is gratifying for me on multiple levels. Long-term relationships based on trust and mutual understanding, and commitment is what I strive to achieve, and I make sure that my client's can rely on me for consistent optimal performance.

I have a day job as a software engineer, so I would be working mostly over the weekends and after normal work hours. I am based in the GMT +5 timezone, so online voice/video chats would be planned keeping that in consideration.

commnet: for Looking for a Master in Quickbooks

abstrac: “We are dedicated to making a difference to the success of our clients – to make them more successful, more productive and better positioned to reach their fullest potential.”
bio:
MGW Accounting Services officially opened it’s doors for business in 2009. Due to his career opportunities up until that point, Mr. Weiss was able to bring with him skills and experience in the areas of tax law, real estate, legal practice, investigative and forensic accounting, art and media studios, retail stores, medical practices, marketing, IT and software services and business operations.

It didn’t take long for Mr. Weiss long to realize that through the power and resources of the internet, he was in the position to connect seamlessly with clients nationwide. That enabled him to share his skills on a much wider scope, but still maintain the personalized service that was so important to him.

Mr. Weiss’s focus for MGWA was not only to ‘take care of the books’ but rather, create systems and operational strategies that would enable clients to increase productivity and lower costs overall. Offering personal and specialized services based on client need is what sets MGWA apart.

5 years later and MGW Accounting is thriving and servicing clients nationwide. Contact us to see how we can partner together!
